name: The social Game
description:
Get the most contact possible on this brand new rip-off of the dumbest game ever !

Add contact by paying influence, a contact produce influence according to his level and give you access to new contact to add. Once you have enough influence you can also buy some Upgrades!

This game is a subsmission to the Extra Credits GameJam #4.

I didn't put enough time on it honestly and it has quite some bug, you will finish it once your influense counter overflow and go to the negatives I guess ^^".
